com.liliya.quiz.playerclient

Class QuizPlayerClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.liliya.quiz.playerclient.QuizPlayerClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QuizPlayerClient

    public class QuizPlayerClientImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements QuizPlayerClient
    Implementation of the Player Client interface Can look up quizzes available to play on the server Can view up to top 3 highest scores

      Retrieves a list of currently available quizzes from the server Displays list to client and accepts player choice
